main event: A family witnessed an unidentified flying object over Andover, Massachusetts on 25 August 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a plane-shaped nose and a dome or halo on its globed form., Witnesses reported the object hovering at an altitude of 1,000 to 2,000 feet for approximately three minutes., The object was estimated to travel at speeds of up to 300 mph before descending rapidly., The sky was clear, and the object had no identifiable markings., The sighting was corroborated by multiple family members.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a pursuit type aircraft
witness description: a civilian source, his wife, and three children
